officialTitle: Impact of Tranexamic Acid Use in Transfusion Rate in Patients With Complex Kidney Stone Undergoing Percutaneous Nephrolithotomy: Randomised, Double-blind, Placebo Controlled Trial
inclusionCriteria: * Complex kidney stone (staghorn calculi GUYS III and IV)
exclusionCriteria:
* Coronary artery disease - stent
* Severe chronic renal failure
* Congenital or acquired thrombophilia/thrombosis event
* Known or suspected allergy
